page.title: 09FENCE 60 YEARS AGO
page.content: 100 years ago there was few people in Fence people were related together. The Padiham Bypass was a dust track.The village was isolated. When my Grandad was a boy they didn't have a tractor on the farm,but a horse and cart to plough. Milking was done by hand because they didn't have machines .25 yrs ago there were changes to the village.The chip shop and the cafe closed.Every week a mobile butchers and greengrocers used to stop for 2 hours just outside the school. The bus services were a lot better than today.Now they come every 2 hours instead of one.The last one is at about 6.30pm.P ople who cannot drive suffer. When the Bypass was built my Grandad lost lots of money because it went right through his fields of crops,so he had to get another job.
